main_definition: The most significant or largest in size, extent, amount, degree, importance, etc.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Most extensive or large in scope or area.
meanings_and_examples.example: He has the biggest garden on the block.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Of greatest size among a group of comparable objects.
meanings_and_examples.example: She was the biggest apple in the basket.

meanings_and_examples.definition: The most important or influential person, place, thing, etc., within a given context.
meanings_and_examples.example: The United States is often considered the biggest economy globally.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Most significant in terms of impact or effect.
meanings_and_examples.example: It was his biggest win yet in his career as a professional golfer.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Holding the largest quantity or volume among several options.
meanings_and_examples.example: He had the biggest slice of cake at the party.
